meanings.definition: The act of distinguishing or separating.
meanings.sent1: His habdalah between work and play was clear.
meanings.sent2: The habdalah of colors made the painting stand out.
meanings.sent3: The habdalah of flavors in the dish was surprising.
meanings.sent4: She made a habdalah between right and wrong.
meanings.sent5: The habdalah of scents in the garden was delightful.
